reuters.title: PHILIPS ELECTRICAL SELLS STAKE IN UNIDARE
reuters.body: <Philips Electrical (Ireland) Ltd> has arranged the sale of the one mln ordinary shares it holds in its subsidiary <Unidare Aluminium Ltd>, Unidare said. The placing has been arranged through <Allied Irish Investment Bank Plc> at an ex-dividend price of 371 Irish pence per share. REUTER 
